title: Retreat
description: Return to the place where it all began…Elsie surprises Henry in California in the sexiest way possible, and inadvertently reveals the secret of their relationship to their families. But just when she thinks everything is finally falling back into place, a revelation changes everything…~RETREAT is a 13,000 word erotic romance novelette. FOR MATURE AUDIENCES ONLY PLEASE.The Henry Sessions, fourth in the series, is due out early December, 2012.The DISARM Series: DISARM (now available) BESIEGE (now available) RETREAT (now available) The Henry Sessions (due out December 2012) ENGAGE (to be announced) CAPTURE (to be announced)
author: June Gray
